casebody.data:
COLEY, et al.
v.
STATE of NC, et al. No. 607A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 7, 2006. Philip R. Isley, G. Eugene Boyce, Raleigh, for Diana L. Coley, et al. Norma S. Harrell, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of March 2006 by Defendants to Strike Plaintiff Appellants' Reply Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 7th day of March 2006."
